job_tasks.phrase: Backend- en frontend-services ontwerpen, ontwikkelen, monitoren en optimaliseren;
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes traditional software engineering tasks related to building and maintaining services.

job_tasks.phrase: Het bouwen van integraties met verschillende API's van onze klanten;
job_tasks.justification: Building integrations with APIs is a core software development and integration task.
Integrating with contact centers is a specific instance of system integration, falling under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken aan de UI om documenttraining en aanmoediging toegankelijk te maken voor onze klanten;
job_tasks.justification: Working on the UI to make features accessible is a frontend software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Het verbeteren van onze code en voortduren op zoek zijn naar manieren om meer onderhoudbare en schaalbare services te schrijven.
job_tasks.justification: Improving code quality, maintainability, and scalability are fundamental software engineering practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Het potentieel van digitale transformatie op het werk te benutten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of business goals and how technology (digital transformation) can be leveraged to achieve them.

job_tasks.phrase: ons gezamenlijke doel is om het voor mensen supergemakkelijk te maken om nuttige AI-assistenten op de werkplek te gebruiken
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business objective and user-centric approach to AI adoption.

soft_skills.phrase: Je spreekt vloeiend Engels of Nederlands;

soft_skills.phrase: Je bent open-minded, proactief en kan zelfstandig werken
soft_skills.justification: Being open-minded and proactive implies a willingness to learn and adapt.

soft_skills.phrase: Je neemt beveiliging en privacy serieus, net als wij.
soft_skills.justification: Taking security and privacy seriously aligns with the ethical considerations of AI development.

soft_skills.phrase: Je bent open-minded, proactief en kan zelfstandig werken
soft_skills.justification: Being proactive and able to work independently suggests a degree of ownership and initiative.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on traditional software engineering tasks (backend/frontend services, UI development, API integrations, code improvement) which fall under Macro-Category A. While the company mentions passion for 'neurale netwerken, LLM en AI-ethiek' and creating 'AI-assistenten' and 'digitale collega's', the specific responsibilities listed do not involve core AI model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG. The role is about building the software that *uses* or *integrates* AI, rather than building the AI itself. Therefore, it fits the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines core software engineering responsibilities. The AI/LLM mentions are more about the company's domain and product vision rather than specific technical tasks for this role. The distinction between building AI-powered applications and building AI models is clear, leading to a high confidence in the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile. A perfect score is not given as the AI aspects are more contextual than task-specific.
